eu.amidst.core.models

Class BayesianNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.models.BayesianNetwork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class BayesianNetwork
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The BayesianNetwork class represents a Bayesian network model.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#bnexample

    For further details about the implementation of this class using Java 8 functional-style programming look at the following paper:

    Masegosa et al. Probabilistic Graphical Models on Multi-Core CPUs using Java 8. IEEE-CIM (2015).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        dag - a directed acyclic graph.
        dists - a list of conditional probability distributions.

      • equalBNs

        public boolean equalBNs(BayesianNetwork bnet,
                        double threshold)
        Tests if two Bayesian networks are equals. A two Bayesian networks are considered equals if they have an equal conditional distribution for each variable.
        Parameters:
        bnet - a given BayesianNetwork to be compared with this BayesianNetwork.
        threshold - a threshold value.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the two BNs are equals or not.
